name: Samurai Zombie Girl
description:
You're a samurai zombie girl, and you must regain your humanity and avoid dismemberment.

Press H to view controls in-game.
Use Z to jump, X and C to attack.
Press D to drop equipment, or E to drop an inventory item.
Press I to view your inventory.

Buy items from the flesh merchant, a strange man who will buy body parts from the other zombies you kill. You can sell him your limbs, too.

This game was made for LD44, and is unfinished.

You may need to zoom out when playing in the browser, if your screen is too small.
